prompts: Create a unique Electric-type Pokemon that resembles a futuristic machine with metallic colors.
Imagine a trio of magnet-like creatures that can control magnetic forces and emit sparks.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of electricity with a sleek, metallic design.
Show me a Pokemon with a round body and magnetic properties, featuring a cool color palette.
Design an Electric/Steel-type Pokemon that has a unique shape and emits energy waves.
Make a Pokemon that is based on technology and magnetism, showcasing bright colors.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that has a robotic appearance and can float in the air.

distinctive_features: Three spherical bodies connected by magnets
